title: Getaway Car
lyrics: No, nothin' good starts in a getaway car

It was the best of times, the worst of crimes<BREAKER>I struck a match and blew your mind<BREAKER>But I didn't mean it, and you didn't see it<BREAKER>The ties were black, the lies were white<BREAKER>In shades of gray in candlelight<BREAKER>I wanted to leave him, I needed a reason

"X" marks the spot where we fell apart<BREAKER>He poisoned the well, I was lyin' to myself<BREAKER>I knew it from the first Old Fashioned, we were cursed<BREAKER>We never had a shotgun shot in the dark (oh!)

You were drivin' the getaway car<BREAKER>We were flyin', but we'd never get far<BREAKER>Don't pretend it's such a mystery<BREAKER>Think about the place where you first met me<BREAKER>Ridin' in a getaway car<BREAKER>There were sirens in the beat of your heart<BREAKER>Should've known I'd be the first to leave<BREAKER>Think about the place where you first met me<BREAKER>In a getaway car, oh-oh-oh<BREAKER>No, they never get far, oh-oh-ah<BREAKER>No, nothin' good starts in a getaway car

It was the great escape, the prison break<BREAKER>The light of freedom on my face<BREAKER>But you weren't thinkin' and I was just drinkin'<BREAKER>While he was runnin' after us, I was screamin', "Go, go, go!"<BREAKER>But with three of us, honey, it's a sideshow<BREAKER>And a circus ain't a love story, and now we're both sorry (we're both sorry)

"X" marks the spot where we fell apart<BREAKER>He poisoned the well, every man for himself<BREAKER>I knew it from the first Old Fashioned, we were cursed<BREAKER>It hit you like a shotgun shot to the heart (oh!)

You were drivin' the getaway car<BREAKER>We were flyin', but we'd never get far<BREAKER>Don't pretend it's such a mystery<BREAKER>Think about the place where you first met me<BREAKER>Ridin' in a getaway car<BREAKER>There were sirens in the beat of your heart<BREAKER>Should've known I'd be the first to leave<BREAKER>Think about the place where you first met me<BREAKER>In a getaway car, oh-oh-oh<BREAKER>No, they never get far, oh-oh-ah<BREAKER>No, nothin' good starts in a getaway car
We were jet-set, Bonnie and Clyde (oh-oh)<BREAKER>Until I switched to the other side, to the other side<BREAKER>It's no surprise I turned you in (oh-oh)<BREAKER>'Cause us traitors never win
I'm in a getaway car<BREAKER>I left you in a motel bar<BREAKER>Put the money in a bag and I stole the keys<BREAKER>That was the last time you ever saw me (oh!)

Drivin' the getaway car<BREAKER>We were flyin', but we'd never get far (don't pretend)<BREAKER>Don't pretend it's such a mystery<BREAKER>Think about the place where you first met me<BREAKER>Ridin' in a getaway car<BREAKER>There were sirens in the beat of your heart (should've known)<BREAKER>Should've known I'd be the first to leave<BREAKER>Think about the place where you first met me<BREAKER>In a getaway car, oh-oh-oh<BREAKER>No, they never get far, oh-oh-ah<BREAKER>No, nothin' good starts in a getaway car

I was ridin' in a getaway car<BREAKER>I was cryin' in a getaway car<BREAKER>I was dyin' in a getaway car<BREAKER>Said goodbye in a getaway car<BREAKER>Ridin' in a getaway car<BREAKER>I was cryin' in a getaway car<BREAKER>I was dyin' in a getaway car<BREAKER>Said goodbye in a getaway car
